pr_title: Prioritise based on attestation subnets when connecting and disconnecting peers

timeline.message: Introduce peer scoring based on subnet subscriptions and choose which peers to disconnect when peer limit is exceeded based on that.
Merge branch 'master' of github.com:PegaSysEng/teku into subnet-scores
Connect to highest scoring peers first.

timeline.bodyText:
May be it makes sense to add some randomness here to make connection manager more reliable? I.e. take 50% of peers by score and 50% of random peers.
It occurred several times from my former experience that strictly selecting peers by their score may lead to connectivity problems due to different reasons
timeline.author: Nashatyrev

replies.bodyText: Seems like a good idea, logged #2332 to follow up and do that.

timeline.bodyText: The same note on randomness here
